regUsername: Username must be between 4 - 24 characters long. No special characters for the username are accepted.
regName: Name must be at least 4 characters long. Please keep it reasonable if using an alias.
regEmail: EMail does not need to be valid, but you should use a real one to recover your password if needed.
regPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include at least one special character.!@#$%^&*()

likeError: You cannot like the same post more than once!
